item.title: Trump team pushes Mexico toward tariffs on Chinese imports
item.description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum has ramped up efforts to crack down on cheap imports from China.

item.title: Trump tariffs won’t just make imports pricier — car insurance costs will go up too
item.description: A tariff on autos would drive up already-inflated insurance costs.

item.title: Pope Francis is in critical health condition, Vatican says
item.description: The pontiff required high flows of oxygen and also received a blood transfusion after tests showed conditions associated with anemia, the Vatican said...

item.title: Musk says all federal workers must explain their work weeks or lose jobs
item.description: An email from the Office of Personnel Management set a deadline of 11:59 pm Monday.

item.title: Trump tariffs promise chaos, but China’s Xi Jinping may be the biggest threat to the global economy, former Treasury official warns
item.description: "When it comes to manufactured goods, trade with China is virtually a one-way street."
